name: Rescue Team 2
description: Rebuild the devastated islands as you take control of the Rescue Team in this fantastic Time Management game! After a terrifying tornado leaves storms through the islands, it's up to the Rescue Team to save the day and save lives.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
